title: Create FO-08 info page
description:
Create the FO-08 info page.

File to create:
- app/fo-08/info/page.tsx

Use InfoPageWrapper component (copy structure from app/fo-07/info/page.tsx).

Content to include:
- Summary box explaining hybrid fragments concept
- 'Based on' section noting FO-06 (technical) + FO-07 (framework)
- Core Concept section with the hybrid fragment principle
- How It Works section with step-by-step flow
- Key Differences table comparing to FO-06 and FO-07
- Technical Details section (agent ID: fo-08, KV namespace: versions.fo-08.*)

Do not close this tick until the verification passes.
acceptance_criteria: test -f app/fo-08/info/page.tsx && grep -q 'Hybrid' app/fo-08/info/page.tsx && echo PASS
